title: Glottography dataset derived from Wikipedia contributors 2024 "List of official languages by country and territory --- Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia"
description: This dataset provides overlapping, contemporary language ranges based on the list of official languages by country and territory from Wikipedia 2024.
citation: {Wikipedia contributors}. 2024. List of official languages by country and territory --- Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. ([Online; accessed 18-November-2024]).
